levels.description:
ATK <@ba.vup>+{atk:0%}</>, ASPD <@ba.vup>+{attack_speed}</>, gains <$ba.camou>Camouflage</>. Generates <@ba.vup>{cost}</> DP after each attack. 
<@ba.rem>Skill activation grants {attack@trigger_time} ammo and the skill ends when all ammo is used (Can manually deactivate skill)</>
